message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd be very interested in. I'm asking for $115 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
Bob, $90 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to come down a little more. How about $105?
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $95
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $95 is still too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $100. This is my final offer.
I'm still not sure I can meet you at $100, but I'm willing to go up to $98
